text: Valence-d'Agen is a railway station in Valence-d'Agen, Occitanie, France.Timetables TER Midi-Pyrénées The station is on the Bordeaux–Sète railway. The station is served by TER (local) services operated by SNCF. ==Train services== The following services currently call at Valence-d'Agen: *local service (TER Occitanie) Agen – Montauban – Toulouse ==References== ==External links== * Category:Railway stations in Tarn-et-Garonne
title: Valence-d'Agen station
